original_text: When Christ died as a sacrifice on the cross, he paid the price to make us free. Because of Christ's death on our behalf, God has forgiven our sins. God is so very kind that he has done all this for us!
korean_text: 우리는 그리스도 안에서 그의 은혜의 풍성함을 따라 그의 피로 말미암아 속량 곧 죄 사함을 받았느니라

sentences.original_text: When Christ died as a sacrifice on the cross
he paid the price to make us free
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 우리를 자유롭게 하기 위해 대가를 치렀습니다

sentences.original_text: Because of Christ's death on our behalf
that he has done all this for us
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 우리를 위해 이 모든 것을 하셨습니다
